stories.title: Amnesic: Seduction and Traps
stories.description: A power-driven web of desire, betrayal, and revenge set in a mysterious modern city. The protagonist awakens with amnesia, guided by the enigmatic Sophia into a world of wealth and temptation, where every woman harbors dangerous secrets.

stories.title: Mind Reading Game: Master Love and Heart
stories.description: A young introverted college graduate accidentally gains the power to read minds and manipulate emotions. As he navigates his newfound abilities in the bustling city of New York, he must choose between using his powers for personal gain or discovering the true meaning of genuine connection.
